column4: i try today to install ipv6 on my linux (ubuntu 7.04) and some point i try to do this command - iptunnel add ipv6tb mode sit remote 193.113.58.80 ttl 64 - and the output was "ioctl: No such device" i dont know what to do now
ipv6 is installed and enabled by default
does your service provider support ipv6?
